moves.1. e4: after our last game he told me he was gonna do a silicain and i looked forward to it
moves.1... e5: um this is not a silican!
moves.2. Bc4 Nf6: he bluffed into not doing a silican, he was too scared as i was hungry for revenge
moves.3. Nc3 Bc5 4. Qf3: figured i would pin the knight to mate
moves.7. Nd5 Nxd5 8. Bxd5: now the rook is pinned, like it was gonna move soon anyways
moves.8... Qh4 9. Rf1: i gave him the pawn on h2 so i could try and trap his queen
moves.9... Qxh2 10. c3: but first i gotta set things up
moves.10... Ne7 11. d4 exd4 12. cxd4 Bb6: good now the bishop is not aiming at anything at all now to focus on the queen
moves.13. Bf4 Qh4: i probably should have castled here
moves.16. g3 Bg4 17. gxh4 Bxf3 18. Be3: trying to rescue the pinned piece
moves.19... Bb6 20. Rd3: gonna pin the bishop instead of the knight
moves.20... Bxd5 21. Nf4: hopfully i can get this game back
moves.22. Rc3 Bxf1 23. Kxf1: now its 3 on 3 but i still do not like it
moves.23... c6 24. a4 a5 25. b5: hoping to get a square for my rook over there or my knight at d5
moves.27. Nd5 a3: he gave me the bishop? i did not think the pawn was gonna make it
moves.28. Nxb6 a2: ok gotta put the rook down there to stop it
moves.29. Rc1 a1=Q: this is the game deciding move right here, i can kill the queen and make the game knight and bishop vrs 2 rooks or i can kill the rook and make it rook and bishop vrs queen and rook. i know that killing the queen is the better move but i do not see any mates with one knight or bishop i also notice his king is still subject to back rank mate ideas, i need a rook for those to work so that made my decision
moves.30. Nxa8 Qxa8: now i just gotta get the piece out of there
moves.31. Ke2 Qa5: queens out now the rook gonna over up a free bishop
moves.32. Kd1 f5: darn it he moved his pawn all my ideas are gone. probably should have killed the queen.
